nodes.documentation: @dev updates rewards. (Does not mint new tokens until withdrawal)
nodes.name: updateReward

nodes.documentation: @dev the owner can periodically call this function to realize the rewards and distribute to the stakers.
nodes.name: realizeGains

nodes.documentation: @dev Function to mint and distribute 1000 tokens to 10 addresses each. There will be a total supply of 10000 tokens by the end of this function call.
nodes.name: airdrop
